entry.title: Airheads Filled Ropes Original Fruit 2oz - 18 Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Perfetti Van Melle
Type: Candy
Price: 21.99

New Airheads Candy

Airheads Filled Ropes are the newest sweet creation from one of our favourite candy brands. They come in the delicious flavours of Bluest Raspberry, Cherry, Watermelon, Strawberry, and Orange. 

57 g x 18 packs 

total weight 1.26 kg

entry.title: Airheads Bites Fruit Candy 2oz - 18 Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Perfetti Van Melle
Type: Candy
Price: 21.59

New Retro Candy

Bite-Sized Fun with Airheads!

The latest sweet creations from our friends at Airheads! Featuring five fantastically fruity flavours of Airheads candy, except now in bite-sized form! Chewy inner centre is enrobed with a candy shell coating for a unique Airheads experience. Pop away with these colourful little candies and be delighted at how delicious and fun Airheads bites are! 

  • BULK PACK: Includes 18 bags of Airheads
  • Made in the USA
  • Gluten-Free
  • Low-Fat

Original Air Heads bars also available.

2oz per treat x 18CT 
36oz total weight

Ingredients

Sugar, glucose syrup, maltodextrin, dextrose, hyrdrogenated coconut oil, contains less than 2% of the following: citric acid, modified corn starch, gelatin, sorbitol, artificial flavors, glycerol, carnauba wax, beeswax, shellac, gum arabic, dextrin, red 40, yellow 5, yellow 6, blue 1.

entry.title: Airheads Bites Paradise Blends Candy 2oz - 18 Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Perfetti Van Melle
Type: Candy
Price: 21.59

A Taste of Paradise from Airheads Candy

The latest sweet creations from our friends at Airheads! Featuring 5 delicious flavours! 1 mystery flavour + 4 tropical fruity flavours of Airheads candy, in bite-sized form! Chewy inner centre is enrobed with a candy shell coating for a new & unique Airheads experience. Pop away with these colourful little candies and be delighted at how delicious and fun Airheads bites are! Order some today and be prepared to be taken to tropical candy paradise!

  • Made in the USA
  • Gluten-Free
  • Low-Fat

Airheads Bites Paradise Blends come in the delicious tropical flavours of:

Cherry Pineapple Blast (red) |  Blue Hawaiian (blue).

Raspberry Lemonade (pink)  |  Citrus Rush (green)

Mystery Flavour (white)


    2oz per treat x 18CT
    36oz box total weight

entry.title: Air Heads Xtremes Belts Rainbow Berry 57g - 18 Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Perfetti Van Melle
Type: Candy
Price: 21.75

 Airheads Xtremes Belts Sour Candy

Sweetly Sour Candy Belts 

There's always gold at the end of the rainbow with Airheads Xtremes Belts Rainbow Berry! Airheads are sweetly sour candy belts that pack a flavourful punch! Soft & chewy strips are berry-flavoured and coated in a sugary and tangy coating. Pucker up for this fantastically fruity adventure! But watch out, these are seriously addicting! You'll be reaching for more and more every time! 

  • BULK PACK: Includes 18 packs
  • Gluten-Free

2 oz.x 18CT
36 oz box total weight 

Ingredients:

Sugar, corn syrup, wheat flour, high fructose corn syrup, corn starch, modified potato starch, water, malic acid, citric acid, contains less than 2% of: Glycerine, artificial flavors, potassium citrate, salt, hydrogenated soybean oil, artificial color (blue 1, red 40, yellow 5, yellow 6).

Ingredients and nutritional information provided by the manufacturer and considered accurate at the time of posting. Refer to product labelling or contact manufacturer directly for current data.

entry.title: Airheads Gum Paradise Blends - 12 Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Perfetti Van Melle
Type: Candy
Price: 18.50

New Gum from Airheads Candy

Transport those tastebuds on a magically delicious journey to Paradise! Your customers will love to delve into the Airheads Gum paradise Blends! That's right, that tangy, and delicious fruity taste of Airheads Candy can now be enjoyed in gum form!
Airheads Gum Paradise Blends is a delightful blend of Raspberry and Lemonade flavours. Each piece of gum is filled with Airheads micro candies so you can rest assured that this gum is packed full of longlasting flavour!
They'll be "no trouble in paradise" with the exceptional taste of Airheads Gum Paradise Blends!

14-Stick Packs | 12 Count Box

Ingredients: 

Xylitol, sorbitol, chewing gum base, maltitol syrup, glycerin, artificial flavours, maltitol, malic acid, citric acid, aspartame, tartaric acid, carrageenan, coconut oil, sucralose, lecithin (soy), acesulfame K, BHT to maintain freshness, coloured with: (turmeric, carmine).

Ingredients and nutritional information provided by the manufacturer and considered accurate at the time of posting. Refer to product labelling or contact manufacturer directly for current data.

entry.title: AirHeads Candy White Mystery - 36 Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Perfetti Van Melle
Type: Candy
Price: 8.25

AirHeads Taffy Candy Bars - White Mystery

With sweet suspense and intrigue, most of us love a good mystery. Especially if it's an Airhead Candy White Mystery! Who knows what flavour you'll get, but we can guarantee that every Airheads Candy is delicious! A soft and flexible Taffy Bar that is filled with delightful flavours. Every bite just makes you want more, after eating one you may just have to eat another! Don't let your customers be in the dark with this mystery, be sure to fill your candy aisles with this sweet Airhead mystery!
  • White Candy
  • Kosher Certified Parve
  • Peanut Free
  • Gluten Free
  • White Candy
  • Made in the USA

.55 oz. Bars | 36-Piece Box

Fresh Retro Candy Shipped Fast at Wholesale Prices!

Ingredients:

Sugar, Corn Syrup, Maltodextrin, Dextrose, Modified Food Starch (Corn), Partially Hydrogenated Soybean Oil, Water, Citric Acid, Artificial Flavors, Artificial Coloring, Blue 1, Blue 2, Red 3, Red 40, Yellow 5, Yellow 6. ALLERGY INFO: Manufactured in a facility that processes wheat flour.

Ingredients and nutritional information provided by the manufacturer and considered accurate at the time of posting. Refer to product labelling or contact manufacturer directly for current data.

This retro candy is light, airy and delicious, and filled with the refreshing taste of fresh raspberries! Blue Raspberry Airheads Candy is a mouthwatering and yummy taste of summertime fun.
